nodes.text: Fegred Ewd was a male Human who lived during the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War. After committing crimes on various worlds in the Core, including the planet Corellia, Ewd became a wanted criminal. He subsequently went into hiding on the planet Froswythe and he lived as a hermit. However, a group of vacationers inadvertently discovered Ewd's hiding place while herding banthas on Froswythe.
